sourcesContent:
import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function About() { const features = [ { emoji: "📊", title: "Comprehensive Tracking", description: "Monitor calories, protein, carbs, and fats with our easy-to-use interface" }, { emoji: "🎯", title: "Smart Limits", description: "Visual indicators help you stay within your nutritional targets" }, { emoji: "⚡", title: "Quick Updates", description: "Easily edit or remove entries as your diet changes throughout the day" }, { emoji: "📱", title: "Always Accessible", description: "Access your nutrition data anywhere, anytime with our responsive design" }, { emoji: "🔍", title: "Search & Sort", description: "Quickly find specific meals or organize them by your preferred metrics" }, { emoji: "📈", title: "Progress Insights", description: "View totals and averages to understand your eating patterns" } ]; const teamPrinciples = [ { emoji: "❤️", title: "User-First Approach", description: "We build features that actually help real people with their health goals" }, { emoji: "🎨", title: "Beautiful Design", description: "We believe tracking your nutrition should be enjoyable, not tedious" }, { emoji: "🚀", title: "Continuous Improvement", description: "We're always working to make NeuTrackeR better for our users" } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

About NeuTrackeR

We're dedicated to helping people achieve their health and nutrition goals through simple, effective tracking tools. Our mission is to make nutrition monitoring accessible and enjoyable for everyone.

{/* Features Grid */}

Why Choose NeuTrackeR?

{features.map((feature, index) => (
{feature.emoji}

{feature.title}

{feature.description}

))}
{/* Our Approach */}

Our Approach

{teamPrinciples.map((principle, index) => (
{principle.emoji}

{principle.title}

{principle.description}

))}
{/* How It Works */}

How It Works

{[ { step: "1", emoji: "📝", text: "Add your meals with our simple form" }, { step: "2", emoji: "🍎", text: "Track all nutritional information" }, { step: "3", emoji: "👀", text: "Monitor your limits and progress" }, { step: "4", emoji: "🎉", text: "Achieve your health goals" } ].map((item, index) => (
{item.step}
{item.emoji}

{item.text}

))}
{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Start Your Journey?

Join thousands of users who are taking control of their nutrition with NeuTrackeR. It's free, easy to use, and designed to help you succeed.

🚀 Start Tracking Now 🏠 Back to Home
{/* Fun Fact */}
💡

Did you know? Consistent tracking can help improve dietary awareness by up to 40%!

); }
